name: Rositsa
message: First of all - Rude. Second of all - How dare you? Third of all - Who is going to listen to me vent about bugs? And last but not least - I've worked with hundreds of people over the years and I can honestly say that you were one of them. Just kidding. ðŸ˜„ All jokes aside, thank you for being such an incredible colleague. Your help, patience, and sense of humor made even the toughest problems a little more bearable. Iâ€™ve learned a lot from working with you, and I genuinely enjoyed every moment of our collaboration. I wish you nothing but success and exciting challenges. Donâ€™t be a stranger and remember, if something breaks mysteriously, Iâ€™ll still probably think of you first.
